text: Sasinas is a 1995 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Thejas Perumanna, starring Ashokan and Rudra in the lead roles. http://www.nthwall.com/ml/Sasinas-1976/9465401381 The story of the film was adapted from a work of Vaikom Muhammad Basheer. ==Cast== * Rudra * Ashokan ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Sasinas
